name: Mohit Kumar
shortIntro: I build applied ML systems across vision, audio, reasoning, legal AI, digital twins, and multi-agent automation. I love designing hybrid architectures and solving real-world problems using ML and software engineering.
longIntro: I'm an ML systems builder passionate about creating hybrid AI architectures that combine neural learning, symbolic reasoning, and agentic automation. My work includes Legal AI (HybEx-Law), multi-agent research systems (Nexus), lung surgery digital twin prototyping (LUNA), vision-based parking systems, agricultural diagnostics, and healthcare audio processing. I enjoy working at the intersection of intelligent systems, optimized ML pipelines, and interactive technological experiences.
